# lookAtTargetPosition

**Instance Property**

The point demand which the look-at constraint uses to generate a new orientation demand.

## Declaration

```swift
var lookAtTargetPosition: SIMD3<Float> { get set }
```

## Discussion

The position is in model space. The computed demand overrides the rotation part of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKComponent/Constraint/target].
